posts.author: Waylaid
posts.content: With level 30 as a max, and currently Fighter/WM would it be a good idea to pick up some PDK levels?

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
Hi Waylaid, and welcome!

I suspect we're likely to need more info than that. The 30 level max - is that for Arelith or somewhere else? Are there any changes/restrictions implemented where you play? How do you like to play? What do you think PDK would bring to the build? And so on...

Have a read of the Build Request Guidelines - that should help.

Cheers

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content: Waylaid, unless your server has strengthened PDK's or you know exactly what you are doing, I would skip the class totally. Take instead one of the full tumble classes that also have UMD in their skill-set, such as rogue/ bard.
